column3: Changes to translations should be submitted to transifex. We pull new translations from there to git once in a while: https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/bitcoin/  (but the other way is difficult)\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/f25811c93ea2e5e8b7ab185c1e4d816625743018 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
@i-rme As @laanwj said, you need to make your changes via Transifex and can close this pull, as we can't accept it that way around.\n
